title: vandhaan vandan
sahitya:
vandAn vandAn bharatA raghurAman vandAn vandAn bharatA (vandAn)



anupallavi



vandAn vandAn mOdiram tandAn tandAn kaimEl

indA indA-dIyinil mundAdE mundAdE 

(vandAn)



caraNam 1



nAyakan shol marandAi aNNA enru pEyanai pOl parandAi

tAyAraiyum turandAi pazhi pODa idarkkO pirandAi



madhyamakAlam: shEyin mukham pArkkum tAyin mukham pOlE kAyum puzhuvukku

shAyum nizhal pOlE

tIyum payirukkum pEyum mazhai pOlE mAyan gajEndranukk-Ai

vandadu pOlE 

(vandAn)



caraNam 2



porundAda buddhi tandAi alaivAyirk-karumbu pOl mettanaindAi

turumbu pol vaTri nondAi vIzhvEn enru perum tIyai shuTri vandAi

        

madhyamakAlam: arum padinAl ANDu AccenradanAlE varundum tambi maDivAn enroru kAlE

parindidO citrakUTatukkippAlE pirinda kanrai tEDit-tirumbum

pashuvai pOlE 

(vandAn)



caraNam 3



tImai vinaigaL maNDu rAvaNa pAmaran Avi uNDu

sEmavEnjanai koDu parattuvAsha mAmuni pUjai kanDu



madhyamakAlam: sAmi raghukuala sOman idO vandAn bhUmagal jAnaki vAman idO vandAn

Om enunm Ayira nAman idO vandAn nI maravA raghurAman iDo

vandAn 

(vandAn)
